issues.message: E402 module level import not at top of file
issues.fix: Move import statements to the top of the file

issues.message: E722 do not use bare 'except' - can hide important errors
issues.fix: Use specific exception types like 'except ImportError:'

issues.message: 626 lines too long (E501) across CLI module
issues.fix: Break long lines using parentheses or string concatenation

issues.message: 62 unused imports (F401) across CLI module
issues.fix: Remove unused imports to reduce code bloat

issues.message: 1372 blank lines with whitespace (W293) across CLI module
issues.fix: Remove trailing whitespace from blank lines

issues.message: F401 'json' imported but unused
issues.fix: Remove unused 'import json' statement

issues.message: 243 blank lines with whitespace (W293) across SDK module
issues.fix: Clean up whitespace in blank lines

issues.message: 1681 blank lines with whitespace (W293) across core module
issues.fix: Remove trailing whitespace from blank lines

issues.message: 466 lines too long (E501) across core module
issues.fix: Break long lines to improve readability

issues.message: F403 'from greenlang import *' used - unable to detect undefined names
issues.fix: Use explicit imports instead of wildcard imports

issues.message: Covariant type variable 'OutT' used in protocol where invariant one is expected
issues.fix: Change type variable declaration to be invariant

issues.message: Function is missing a return type annotation
issues.fix: Add return type annotation: -> None or appropriate type

issues.message: Unsupported operand types for - (float and None)
issues.fix: Add None check before subtraction or use Optional type properly

issues.message: 541 type errors found by mypy across all modules
issues.fix: Add type annotations and fix type inconsistencies

issues.message: Hardcoded Unix path '/etc/greenlang/auth.json' won't work on Windows
issues.fix: Use os.path.join() or pathlib for cross-platform paths

issues.message: Default path '/tmp/gl_input' is Unix-specific
issues.fix: Use tempfile.gettempdir() for cross-platform temporary directories

issues.message: Hardcoded Unix path '/etc/greenlang/policies' won't work on Windows
issues.fix: Use platform-appropriate config directory (e.g., AppData on Windows)

issues.message: Potential circular dependency risk with cross-module imports
issues.fix: Review import structure and consider using dependency injection

issues.message: 15 instances of bare except clauses (E722) that could hide errors
issues.fix: Replace with specific exception handling

issues.message: 70 f-strings missing placeholders (F541)
issues.fix: Either add placeholders or use regular strings

summary: Critical code quality issues found: 5076 total violations including 2269 in CLI, 394 in SDK, and 2413 in core modules. Major issues include missing type annotations (541 type errors), excessive whitespace (3296 instances), hardcoded non-portable paths, and dangerous bare except clauses. These issues significantly impact test reliability and coverage.
